name: Fiddlesticks
title: the Harbinger of Doom

passive.sanitizedDescription: Fiddlesticks' spells reduce the Magic Resistance of his targets.
passive.name: Dread
passive.description: Fiddlesticks' spells reduce the Magic Resistance of his targets.

lore:
For nearly twenty years, Fiddlesticks has stood alone in the easternmost summoning chamber of the Institute of War. Only the burning emerald light of his unearthly gaze pierces the musty darkness of his dust-covered home. It is here that the Harbinger of Doom keeps a silent vigil. His is a cautionary tale of power run amok, taught to all summoners within the League. Decades ago, there existed a powerful rune mage from Zaun - Istvaan. At the end of the fifth Rune War, he became one of the League's first summoners. Too much a prisoner to the old ways of magic, Istvaan stepped further and further outside the rules of conduct in the League. In what was ultimately his last match, his reach finally exceeded his grasp. Sealing himself inside the easternmost summoning chamber, he began incanting the most forbidden of rituals - an extra-planar summoning.

What exactly happened inside that chamber remains unknown. No champion came to represent Zaun that day in Summoner's Rift. Only silence echoed back from repeated knocks on the chamber door. The first apprentice who entered was cut down immediately by an unearthly scythe. What few who followed and survived were driven mad by fear, mere husks of men gibbering about crows and death. Afraid of the evil even Istvaan could not control, the League sealed all exits to the chamber, hoping they could contain what they could not destroy. Years went by, but the wooden figure within never moved save to slay any foolish enough to enter. Seeing no recourse to reclaim the chamber, the Council instead devised a use for Fiddlesticks: executioner. While he comes to life and seemingly abides by the rules of summoning in the Fields of Justice, what he awaits inside his chamber is unknown. His unmoving face yields no clues, and his scythe stands ready to strike down any who stand before him.

Those who say 'you have nothing to fear but fear itself' have not yet felt the crows.

spells.description: Strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Strikes a target enemy unit with fear, applying Dread and causing it to flee in terror for {{ e2 }} seconds.
spells.tooltip: Strikes a target enemy unit with fear, applying Dread and causing it to flee in terror for {{ e2 }} seconds.
spells.name: Terrify

spells.description: Fiddlesticks saps the life force of an enemy, dealing damage to a target over time and healing himself.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Fiddlesticks saps the life force of an enemy, dealing damage to a target over time and healing himself.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second to target unit and heals Fiddlesticks for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt. Lasts up to 5 seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second to target unit and heals Fiddlesticks for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt.
Lasts up to 5 seconds.
spells.name: Drain

spells.description: A wisp of wind strikes an enemy unit and then bounces to nearby enemy units, dealing damage and silencing the victims.
spells.sanitizedDescription: A wisp of wind strikes an enemy unit and then bounces to nearby enemy units, dealing damage and silencing the victims.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Fires a missile at the targeted enemy that deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and silences for 1.25 seconds before bouncing to a new target (deals 150% damage to minions and monsters). Dark Wind can bounce up to {{ e1 }} times and will prioritize enemies it has not yet hit. Targets can be hit multiple times but will only be silenced once.
spells.tooltip:
Fires a missile at the targeted enemy that deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and silences for 1.25 seconds before bouncing to a new target (deals 150% damage to minions and monsters).

Dark Wind can bounce up to {{ e1 }} times and will prioritize enemies it has not yet hit. Targets can be hit multiple times but will only be silenced once.
spells.name: Dark Wind

spells.description: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage each second to all enemy units in the area.
spells.sanitizedDescription: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage each second to all enemy units in the area.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks for 5 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second to all enemy units in the area. This has a 1.5 second channel duration and teleports Fiddlesticks to target location.
spells.tooltip: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks for 5 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second to all enemy units in the area. This has a 1.5 second channel duration and teleports Fiddlesticks to target location.
spells.name: Crowstorm
